casebody.data:
Robert James Bauer, a Minor, by His Next Friend, Robert J. Bauer, Jr., et al., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Board of Education of School Dist. No. 109, Lake County, et al., Defendants-Appellees.(No. 73-44;Second DistrictOctober 4, 1974.Paul E. Hamer, of Northbrook, for appellants.Head, Purcell & War drope and Sidney Z. Karasik, both of Chicago, for appellees.

Rehearing denied October 23, 1974.
